summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4606 for the improvement of 30th Avenue Southwest, from West Holden Street to West Trenton Street; by grading and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 53629, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
